story_alola_02_07000/2401_1001_0100_10:
If you’re itching for a battle, Team Skull can play
with ya!
story_alola_02_07000/2401_1001_0600_10:
We haven’t forgotten our promise to the
Aether Foundation.
story_alola_02_07000/2401_1001_0800_10: Guys! Show ’em what destruction looks like!
story_alola_02_07000/2401_1001_0900_10:
We’ll give five hundred percent to save our
boy Guzma!
story_alola_02_07000/2401_1001_1000_10: We’ll cut you to the bone!
story_alola_02_07000/2401_1001_1200_10: It w-wasn’t supposed to go like this!
story_alola_02_07000/2401_1001_1300_10:
It’s you guys, right? Opening Ultra Wormholes here
and there around Pasio?
story_alola_02_07000/2401_1001_1400_10: How do we close them? Spit it out!
story_alola_02_07000/2401_1001_1500_10: Heh! Why would we tell you?!
story_alola_02_07000/2401_1001_1600_10:
Hey, you. What do you do if a
machine breaks?
story_alola_02_07000/2401_1001_1800_10: You hit it hard, right? At least, that’s what I do.
story_alola_02_07000/2401_1001_1900_10: And usually it’ll just break, leaving no trace.
story_alola_02_07000/2401_1001_2000_10: Do you want me to “fix” you?
story_alola_02_07000/2401_1001_2200_10:
O-OK! Th-there’s a device that forces Ultra
Wormholes to open!
story_alola_02_07000/2401_1001_2300_10:
If you stop the device, the Ultra Wormholes
should close!
story_alola_02_07000/2401_1001_2500_10: OK! We’ll destroy it! Let’s go, you punks!
story_alola_02_07000/2401_1001_2700_10: Destroying’s our thing—we’re bad to the bone!
story_alola_02_07000/2401_1001_3000_10: He was glad to have a chance to help you again.
